channel.title: Call of duty black ops
channel.description:
[img]http://www.gamestop.com/common/images/lbox/200787brp.jpg[/img] http://www.callofduty.com/blackops/ http://www.gamestop.com/browse/ProductMerch.aspx?groupid=851&loc=homeflash http://twitter.com/JD_2020
There's not really any info on it.[s]But there will be a teaser trailer on GTTV tonight.(12:40 am ET on spike)[/s] I just hope it's not fail like modern warfare 2 was... EDIT: the teaser trailer was bs -.- didn't really show anything... Here's some 'rumor' that i found on a website:
[size=8pt]Call of Duty 7 has allegedly been exposed as Call of Duty: Black Ops. This has been declared by a MYSTERIOUS SOURCE from Activision that recently spilled the beans. According to this MYSTERIOUS SOURCE, Treyarch's upcoming game will take place not only in Vietnam, but at various points throughout history, providing a narrative that spans many times and places.
World War II, the Cold War, Cuba, South America and the famous Iranian embassy siege in London are all rumored to be included in Black Ops.
Even more intriguing is the rumor that this game will bring back dedicated servers are a notoriously unpopular discharge from Modern Warfare 2. Treyarch is also said to be resurrecting World At War's popular zombie mode, because zombies make everything more fun, apparently.
Frankly, this all sounds a bit mental to us, but we felt we'd pass along what everybody's rambling about so you can make your own mind up. An interesting concept if it's true, but I'd take more than a grain of salt with this rumor right now. Maybe pick up the whole shaker. [/size]
I think the rumor is real.Well...So far 50% of it has been true.

item.title: Call of duty black ops
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

There’s no way they would remove zombies. Just now it’s Asian zombies.

Personally, WaW had the shit online play compared to MW. WaW had alot more host issues, spawn killing, and general bullshit.

And you never know, they might (of WWII is anyway part of the story) through in a mission where your the pilot of the Enola gay dropping the atomic bomb on Hiroshima.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of duty black ops
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Despair, post:11, topic:338629”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=435014.msg3194827#msg3194827 date=1272674490]

Hmm I’d only get this IF they were actually to come out with zombies in it.
[/quote]But there are to be zombies in this one

No I’m saying that no one knows for sure that there will actually be zombies, I mean they could always say “get rid of the zombie feature nao!”[/quote]
I doubt they would get rid of zombies…They had at least 1,000,000 downloads from each map pack.(i think :|)
the fact is they made a lot of money from it

Read full topic

item.title: Call of duty black ops
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:9, topic:338629”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=435014.msg3194832#msg3194832 date=1272675143]
Ugh. Modern warfare was alright but then Modern Warfare 2 came out and I laughed at the fact someone could make a game that was so repulsive. Then they come out with this shit?
[/quote]Atleast there will be some sort of REAL story… Everyone I know who has played WaW said it was amazing. Gameplay was great, story made sense and was good, and of course, zombies. Since CoD7 will be placed around the Vietnam War, it should be good. There won’t be anything like the nuke anymore, the weapons are going to be more balanced, there will still be customizable killstreak rewards, and zombies shall be back.[/quote]

Idk, mw and mw2 are a collaboration of huge kill scenes and nothing more.

Read full topic

Then they come out with this shit?[/quote]Atleast there will be some sort of REAL story… Everyone I know who has played WaW said it was amazing. Gameplay was great, story made sense and was good, and of course, zombies. Since CoD7 will be placed around the Vietnam War, it should be good. There won’t be anything like the nuke anymore, the weapons are going to be more balanced, there will still be customizable killstreak rewards, and zombies shall be back.

[size=8pt]Call of Duty 7 has allegedly been exposed as Call of Duty: Black Ops. This has been declared by a MYSTERIOUS SOURCE from Activision that recently spilled the beans. According to this MYSTERIOUS SOURCE, Treyarch’s upcoming game will take place not only in Vietnam, but at various points throughout history, providing a narrative that spans many times and places.

World War II, the Cold War, Cuba, South America and the famous Iranian embassy siege in London are all rumored to be included in Black Ops.

Even more intriguing is the rumor that this game will bring back dedicated servers are a notoriously unpopular discharge from Modern Warfare 2. Treyarch is also said to be resurrecting World At War’s popular zombie mode, because zombies make everything more fun, apparently.

Frankly, this all sounds a bit mental to us, but we felt we’d pass along what everybody’s rambling about so you can make your own mind up. An interesting concept if it’s true, but I’d take more than a grain of salt with this rumor right now. Maybe pick up the whole shaker. [/size]
